Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Lab Centrifuge^reset; to the ^green;annoying guy^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;离心机^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: If you want to advance your lab, you are going to want ^orange;lab centrifuge^reset;. Without one, you can't get ^green;an advanced centrifuge^reset; to produce high-end fissionable materials. Make a ^orange;Lab Centrifuge^reset; in a ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me.
Texts.Chs: 如果你想让你的实验成果更为出色，那么就制作一个^orange;离心机^reset;吧！没有它你就没法生产出更高级的材料，更别说升级到高级离心机了。你可以在^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;里制作它。

Texts.Eng: When you are able to, ^green;upgrade to an advanced centrifuge^reset; to really step up your lab game!
Texts.Chs: 真的很棒。谢谢你的帮助。这是给你的奖励。
